profil.skills: By integrating the kinshasa digital Academy, my experience in the world of software development and design has increased to the extent that I know exactly how to meet the needs of my clients.  Innovation being at the heart of my achievements, I place particular emphasis on new technology, because for me it represents the future.  Teamwork being an essential asset in the accomplishment of a good job, I define myself as a fervent collaborator.
profil.about: Holding a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and  Kinshasa Digital Academy's student in 2021. Very passionate by the computer science industry, I can't let go any opportunity which can let me learn or pratice or once again shared my knowledge  related to computer science topics with a focus on the App development and database management.

services.service_description: De la conception au déploiement, je réalise des applications web de divers types.
Android, IOS, Windows je suis dans la mise en oeuvre des applications mobiles sur mesure tournant dans plusieurs plateformes.
UX & UI, je réalise des designs tenant compte des règles et principes pour une bonne expérience utilisateur.
J’assure la maintenance des codes déjà existants en les optimisants avec les bonnes pratiques pour une bonne complexité.
J’aide les tiers avec des techniques d’optimisation pour les moteurs de recherche à la mise en oeuvre de l'amélioration du positionnement de leur site web ou application web.

projects.project_description: An online medical consultation application, done with Flutter and PhP
A warning system for medicale appointments, done with Flutter and PhP
A simple stock management system, done with Javascript and GoogleSheet
Design of a portfolio website, made with Javascript, Html and Css
